normalized: the sky was dyed a brilliant twilight color.
while the sound of jet engines soared overhead into the setting sun, dark green armed helicopters came and went from the island.
they were armed helicopters belonging to the taimanin "section three", which were also deploying american forces.
looking up to that sort of imposing sky, i pinpointed on one helicopter in particular.
it was already far off in the distance.
and yet, i continued to stare at that tiny dot in the sky.

name: asagi
normalized: （sakura…）
sakura had been put on a military transport helicopter and lifted away from here.
i had wanted to go along with her, but oboro's clone's whereabouts were still unknown.
despite nothing yet being settled, she wasn't going to leave this island.
now, the public safety search division were mobilizing and carrying out tactics to suppress the island in various places.
the chief had finally been able to kick the prime minister's ass into putting some tactics into place here.
the chief hurriedly issued directions from a radio nearby as he looked at a spread out map of the island.

name: yamamoto
normalized: that's right…, it's not just the ryuumon building.
you have to thoroughly search the other building's basements as well
i could hear the chief's voice bellowing into the transmitter even from here.
the truth was, i was participating in the tactics as well, but the chief had ordered me to standby here.

name: asagi
normalized: （it's getting a little…, chilly, isn't it…）
a cool sea breeze wafted ashore as the day waned.
i had a newly provisioned ninja costume on, but for some reason it didn't feel right.
it spite of it no longer being drenched with semen, i felt that it was somehow resisting my figure.
when i looked to the east sky, it had begun to dye with the faint indigo blue of night.
i could no longer see the helicopter sakura was in.
time was just quietly passing by.

name: asagi
normalized: （i wonder if she'll be arriving at the hospital soon…）
she should be arriving in no time without the worry of any kind of delay as it was a military grade chopper.

name: asagi
normalized: （she'll be alright…, surely she'll be alright…）
standing around doing nothing like this was a terrible pain in itself.
there wasn't much resistance in the reports from the suppression forces, which said that many of the enemies had already been murdered by someone's hand.
it appeared that chinese union lot were being disposed of to destroy evidence, but that too seemed unusual.
particularly that the underground labs had been completely obliterated.
it was baffling that all this had happened in just a few hours.

name: asagi
normalized: （what the hell…, is going on…）
oboro's clone had still not been found and other ryuumon members had been slaughtered.

name: asagi
normalized: （who…, is doing this…）
it wasn't just the ryuumon matter either.
i had returned to my original form, but i also had to react to the transfiguration i had awoken in my body.

name: asagi
normalized: （it was thanks to that strength that i survived…, but, that…）

name: yamamoto
normalized: asagi, you have a message from the hospital!

name: asagi
normalized: ehh…
the chief, still holding the transmitter in his hand, shouted out in my direction.

name: yamamoto
normalized: it looks like sakura has arrived safely at the hospital.
her injuries don't seem to be life threatening

name: asagi
normalized: …really?

name: yamamoto
normalized: yeah.
you no longer need to worry
the feeling of relief made me tear up a little.

name: asagi
normalized: chief, any news on kurou?

name: yamamoto
normalized: not yet.
i let everyone know to get in touch with me as soon as they do.
he's still as of now unaccounted for since he was heading to rescue you

name: asagi
normalized: the ryuumon--, do you think he has anything to do with the mysterious force that has attacked the island?

name: yamamoto
normalized: i don't know.
but they've left nothing in their path.
i am certain that it has to be a highly trained unit

name: asagi
normalized: （things like those guys being able to massacre the ryuumon…, it didn't seem to be like him, but…）
the chinese union were laying in wait behind the ryuumon.
whether or not he had read that sort of doubt in me, the chief continued to speak.

name: yamamoto
normalized: it's intelligence from off record sources, but the intelligence says that a state-of-the-art stealth helicopter took off from yokosuka's american base

name: asagi
normalized: american base?

name: yamamoto
normalized: that's right.
it appears to be a special forces american base, but they said they didn't see the direction it was flying

name: asagi
normalized: …a state-of-the-art stealth helicopter vanishing into tokyo bay would be befitting of such a force, wouldn't it

name: yamamoto
normalized: it's strictly off the record intelligence.
i want to make that clear, asagi

name: asagi
normalized: yes, chief…

name: asagi
normalized: （was it american…or the chinese union…）
for the time being, i had to resign to the fact that it was off the record evidence masked by hear say
the suppression tactics had gone very well so far.
it looked like there wasn't much meaning in having deployed armed forces like this with most of the reports turning up dead bodies.
and the ryuumon members that had survived appeared to be nothing more than small-time hoodlums that had no knowledge of the underground lab and prostitutes.
even so, the chief issued instructions one by one for the benefit of getting a handle on the island's current state of affairs.

name: yamamoto
normalized: nn…, is that so…, understood
there was a slight change in the chief's tone.

name: yamamoto
normalized: prepare the transport helicopter asap
even if there were wounded, it seemed a little offbeat.
there was mostly no resistance, but maybe there was a strong counterattack that he hadn't anticipated.

name: asagi
normalized: --chief?
i called out to the chief who had finished the transmission.

name: yamamoto
normalized: i just got word.
it looks like we have kurou.
he's a little banged up, but it doesn't look like his life is in jeopardy
i instinctively loosened up my expression in a sigh of relief with that news.
it wasn't just sakura, but kurou's safety as well.
they said they had found kurou deep under the ryuumon building in a partially collapsed subway.
shortly thereafter, kurou had been loaded onto a stretcher and carried here.
i rushed over to that stretcher and greeted him.

name: asagi
normalized: …kurou!
kurou was talking to the people who were carrying his stretcher as i approached him.

name: kurou
normalized: stop

name: man
normalized: huh?

name: kurou
normalized: i have to talk to my commanding officer…, i beg you, help me off the stretcher

name: man
normalized: but…
the transport helicopter was already standing by to go straight to the hospital, its rotors were idling.
even if his regeneration abilities were however more superior, kurou wasn't immortal and at some point he would need the medical treatment of a hospital.

name: kurou
normalized: it won't be a second…, please

name: man
normalized: …understood
the group members slowly lowered his stretcher.

name: asagi
normalized: --kurou?
i turned a dubious look towards kurou as he got off his stretcher.

name: kurou
normalized: …have i been worrying the commanding officer a little, i wonder?
he floated his usual smile below his round sunglasses.

name: asagi
normalized: yes, i was worried…, the whole time you got caught, how that bald head of yours was doing, huh
but, i was talking frivolously.

name: kurou
normalized: unfortunately, captain…, i didn't exactly get caught….

name: asagi
normalized: …what's going on?
considering it was kurou, his expression was not at all clear.

name: kurou
normalized: please listen to me closely, captain…, my body has been hijacked by that edwin black

name: asagi
normalized: wha--

name: kurou
normalized: i'm serious…, at this very moment…, that man is deeply interrelated with me

name: asagi
normalized: …can you give me a brief rundown?

name: kurou
normalized: yes…
kurou, who was being controlled by edwin black, began to explain concisely what he had learned during the time he had been assimilated.
oboro, who had infiltrated the nomads as a chinese union spy, had conversely betrayed the chinese union and, in secret took over the nomads.
and then, the nomads had plotted to takeover the ryuumon by secretly substituting oboro's clone with the now resurrected oboro in the form of a vampire.
but, the most wondrous thing was that the original oboro still lived.

name: asagi
normalized: that oboro…, lives…, and she's a vampire too…

name: kurou
normalized: i'm sorry to say it's true

name: asagi
normalized: …what about the lot that tore up the underground research facilities?

name: kurou
normalized: they looked to be edwin black's sons.
they seemed to be collecting data by force

name: asagi
normalized: experiment data, huh

name: kurou
normalized: yes.
they had usurped the organization and substituted the clone with the original and appeared to have got out of there in a hurry

name: asagi
normalized: i see…

name: asagi
normalized: （saya's data…perhaps, my data as well…, had fallen into that man's hands, huh…）
at last the full story had come to light.
they had taken the original research, like saya, that the chinese union had taken from the nomads.
conversely the nomads wanted that information.
sharing the consciousness of edwin black was a double-edged sword; it also gave edwin black all of what kurou knew--
it seems that man did that purposely to let us know what was really going on.
whether it was as a challenge, gratitude, or mere harassment.

name: kurou
normalized: it appears that edwin black is spreading word of what looks to be a terrorist organization

name: asagi
normalized: …us…, no, to lure me out?

name: kurou
normalized: so it would seem…, it appears the captain is highly favored by that man

name: asagi
normalized: …that's not something i want to talk about
while smiling bitterly, i turned my glance to the setting sun.

name: asagi
normalized: he lured us to this island and made me fight saya…

name: asagi
normalized: after that, he carried away the things he wanted from this island pretending to be a taimanin and got away just in time as the real taimanin showed up--

name: asagi
normalized: the american forces with the nomads and the chinese union with the ryuumon, doing what they like in our country….

name: yamamoto
normalized: edwin black again….

name: asagi
normalized: chief?
how long have you been there?

name: yamamoto
normalized: …i caught half of it.
i have to get back to issuing directions.
i want the important parts now
the chief looked at kurou with a grim face.

name: kurou
normalized: i'm sorry
i muttered quietly without altering my expression.

name: asagi
normalized: it's our loss now, isn't it.
but…

name: yamamoto
normalized: what?

name: asagi
normalized: no…, never mind
the words i had swallowed down was that we couldn't keep losing forever.
i suddenly fixated on my right hand.
certainly it had been our loss this time around.
but, they had also made a blunder.
i still lived.
and, i had called forth a demonic power that had been sleeping inside of me for the sake of killing saya.
i no longer heard that demonic voice now.
but, if i could wake that strength that was sleeping inside of me once more--
as the setting sun dipped into the sea in the distance, i vowed to comeback.
